full_summary:
======================================

Aerological Observations and Related Services at the Goose Bay Upper Air Station
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Reference Number: cb-4454-69252834
---------------------------

**Government of Canada Tender Notice**

**CONTRACT DETAILS**
----------------------

The Government of Canada, represented by Environment and Climate Change Canada, invites you to submit a proposal for the provision of Aerological Observations and Related Services at the Goose Bay Upper Air Station. The required services include:

* Environmental monitoring (environmental monitoring systems and related activities)
* Air quality management (soil, air, water sampling, and laboratory analysis)
* Environmental laboratory services (sampling and analysis)
* Meteorological services (weather observation and forecasting)
* Air quality science service (analysis and advisory services)

**TENDER DETAILS**
-----------------

* Solicitation Number: 5000071288
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2023-05-09, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2026-08-31
* Contract Category: SRV

**INTERESTED COMPANIES**
-------------------------

We are interested in receiving proposals from experienced companies capable of providing these services. The selected contractor must have the capability to deliver the required services, provide high-quality laboratory analysis, and meet the performance standards specified in the contract.

**OFFER REQUIREMENTS**
----------------------

The proposal must include:

* A detailed understanding of the requirements outlined in the solicitation document
* A clear description of the methods and procedures that will be used to deliver the required services
* Evidence of the contractor's experience in providing similar services
* A detailed schedule of activities and timelines
* A detailed analysis of the costs associated with delivering the required services

**TENDER SOLUTION**
-----------------

To submit a proposal, please refer to the solicitation document for details on the information and documentation required. The notice and documentation can be downloaded from [www.CanadaBuys.ca](http://www.CanadaBuys.ca).

It is your responsibility to review the solicitation document and to ensure that you meet the specified requirements and standards.

You can contact us at timothy.pelletier@ec.gc.ca or (902) 920-4479 for any clarification or questions.

** TRADE AGREEMENTS**
----------------------

The procurement program is applicable to a number of trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
